content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron plate production facility at position(0,0)
Consists of stone furnaces at positions (0,0) and (2,0)

## ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using undefined variables
- Ensure that all variables are defined before using them. 
### Errors when calling functions without checking preconditions
- Check if a research is in progress before calling `get_research_progress()`
### Errors when placing entities too far away
- Move closer to the target position before attempting to place an entity.
### Errors when crafting items without required sub-ingredients
- Ensure that all required sub-ingredients are available before attempting to craft an item.

## NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
